about_the_game:
Adult VR Game Room is a game in which you run a high-tech research laboratory. Your job is to manage its machinery and resources, send expeditions to mysterious distant realms to acquire new DNA samples, complete contracts, and create ACTORs (Artificial Cell Transmutable Organic Robots).

Combine different species, races, body types and traits to create new exquisite ACTORs. Interact with them, control them, become them, or simply sell them for profit.

Meet other players and their creations in an online Multiplayer. Share your research results and conduct cooperative experiments.

The possibilities are virtually endless. The choice is yours. What will you create?

Manage a Research Laboratory


Manage a high-tech research laboratory and resources. Upgrade your equipment, complete contracts, send expeditions to mysterious distant realms in search of new exotic specimens.

Create ACTORs (Artificial Cell Transmutable Organic Robots)


Incubate exciting new ACTORs from acquired DNA samples. Control them, test them, modify them, become them or simply sell them. Combine different species, races, body types, and traits to create unique exquisite ACTORs.

Create Your Style


Customize your creations with a wide array of items like hairstyles, neckwear, headwear, armwear and more. Create unique actor styles with ease by using the new style collection. Save & Load your favorite styles with a click of a button.

Explore Distant Realms


Embark on an incredible journey of exploration and discovery. Send expeditions to mysterious distant realms. Unlock their secrets and collect mythical creatures DNA samples. What will you find?

Features

  • Breeding System - Combine different species, races, body types, and traits to create a unique, one of a kind ACTORs.
  • Interaction System - Pose, animate, control and possess your ACTORS.
  • Realistic Physics - Physics based gameplay that looks and feels real.
  • Customizable environments - Add furniture, props, toys, lights and other items to any environment to make it your own.
  • Online Multiplayer - Play together. Show off your ACTORs and see other players’ creations.
  • Voice Chat - Real-time voice chat for immersive and interactive gameplay.
  • Public & Private - Both public and private lobbies are available for everyone.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages. Nudity, Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

name: Adult VR Game Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 series / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 series / AMD Ryzen 7 or greater
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1080 ti / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Adult VR Game Room is a game in which you manage a research laboratory equipment and resources. Breed unique ACTORS (Artificial Cell Transmutable Organic Robots). Interact with them, control them, become them. Meet other players and their creations in an online Multiplayer.
